title: 1st Year doubt
content: Will they start phy cycle or chem cycle for 2024 freshers?

comments.body:
depends on ur name  
first half of 1st years will be chem in 1st sem and phy during 2nd sem and vice versa for other half  
but Kcet 3rd round ppl they just put irrespective of their names
Even for second round people, it will divided in half. Last year there were 4 sections for third round people, 2 sections in chem, 2 in phy
How many will they come from 2nd round and 3rd round ?
We don't get those info's in kea website as we get on pessat
More then 70% of students are still participating in the counselling

LoL, on alphabetical distribution.   
  
I am trying imagine all Rahuls and Adityas in same class and the fact that it not a coincidence it is done intentionally  :-)
LoL, I am trying imagine all Rahuls and Adityas (just an example) in same class and the fact that it not a coincidence it is done intentionally :-)
Yes, that's how it works. There were 7 Ananyas in my class.
